sentences.sContent: Few had expected that change to be as cataclysmic as it turned out to be.
sentences.sCn: 没有人预测到那些变化会变成一种大灾难。

remMethod.val: 来自cataclysm(n. 巨变； 灾难)

words.tran: 灾难；大洪水，地震；（社会政治的）大变动

trans.tranOther: A cataclysmic event is one that changes a situation or society very greatly, especially in an unpleasant way
